English.Text: A disaster of their own fashioning. Instead of finding a proper solution, the crew hurriedly don standard-issue gloves. The leather is so smooth in the palm, it is worse than climbing with no gloves at all. The ship lurches inexorably into that silhouette— a hideously craggy isle — and the impact flings the gripless riggers into the water. Visibility is so poor, and the water so cold, that there's no hope of saving those gone overboard.
